description:
A pilot in the Mobile Suit Development Council`s http://anidb.net/ch132081 [Dominicus special forces team]. He demonstrates his ability using the mobile suit http://anidb.net/ch123015 [Beguir-Beu], produced by the http://anidb.net/ch132072 [Grassley company].
Source: Official page
name: Kenanji Avery
